content: Creation based on several files and folders is not available for this type of room. To create such a room, go to the Rooms section or use one of the PDF forms.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a warning message displayed when attempting to create a room based on multiple files and folders. It informs users that this feature is not available and provides alternative options to proceed. This text appears as a tooltip or alert in the Create Edit Room Dialog component, specifically when selecting a certain room type.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To create such a room' is awkwardly translated as 'Para crear una sala de este tipo'. It's more natural to say 'Para crear este tipo de sala'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para crear este tipo de sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Useisiin tiedostoihin ja kansioihin perustuva luonti ei ole käytössä tämäntyyppisessä huoneessa" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Creation based on several files and folders is not available for this type of room." It's a bit too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Finnish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Luominen useista tiedostoista ja kansioista ei ole mahdollista tämän tyyppisessä huoneessa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The suggestion to 'copy one {{ organizationName }} PDF form at a time' is not a direct translation of 'go to the Rooms section or use one of the PDF forms'. It significantly changes the user action. While it might be a workaround, it's not the intended meaning and could confuse users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Voit luoda sellaisen huoneen siirtymällä Huoneet-osioon tai käyttämällä PDF-lomaketta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The insertion of '{{ organizationName }}' is unexpected and might not be appropriate for this context. It assumes a variable should be inserted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove '{{ organizationName }}' unless it's a necessary variable in the system.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Մի քանի ֆայլերի և թղթապանակների վրա հիմնված ստեղծումը" (Creation based on several files and folders) is a bit awkward and could be more naturally translated. While technically correct, it doesn't flow well in Armenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like "Մի քանի ֆայլեր և թղթապանակներ պարունակող սենյակի ստեղծումը" (The creation of a room containing several files and folders) or "Մի քանի ֆայլեր և թղթապանակներով սենյակի ստեղծումը" (The creation of a room with several files and folders).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "ստեղծումը" (the creation) is repeated. While not strictly wrong, it can be improved for stylistic reasons.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the repetition by rephrasing: "Մի քանի ֆայլերի և թղթապանակների վրա հիմնված սենյակները չեն ստեղծվել" (Rooms based on several files and folders cannot be created).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "stanza di questo tipo" is awkward and doesn't directly translate the meaning of "such a room". It implies the user is already familiar with the type of room being created. A more accurate translation would convey the intention of creating a room that supports file and folder based creation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: La creazione basata su più file e cartelle non è disponibile per questo tipo di stanza. Per creare una stanza che supporti questa funzionalità, accedi alla sezione Stanze o utilizza uno dei moduli PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels a little disjointed. Splitting the second sentence to better flow might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: La creazione basata su più file e cartelle non è disponibile per questo tipo di stanza. Per creare una stanza che supporti questa funzionalità, ti invitiamo ad accedere alla sezione Stanze o utilizzare uno dei moduli PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "based on several files and folders" is not perfectly conveyed by "여러 파일 및 폴더를 기반으로 하는". While technically correct, it sounds a little clunky and formal in Korean. A more natural phrasing might emphasize the dependence on the files/folders.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 여러 파일 및 폴더에 의존하여 생성이 불가능합니다. (Creation is not possible dependent on several files and folders.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The full stop/period at the end of the first sentence is mandatory and missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 유형의 룸에서는 여러 파일 및 폴더를 기반으로 하는 생성이 불가능합니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Creation based on several files and folders" is translated as "ການສ້າງພື້ນຖານອີງຕາມເອກະສານແລະໂຟນເດີ". While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural translation might be "ການສ້າງໂດຍອີງຕາມເອກະສານແລະໂຟນເດີ" or "ການສ້າງທີ່ອີງຕາມເອກະສານແລະໂຟນເດີ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການສ້າງທີ່ອີງຕາມເອກະສານແລະໂຟນເດີ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation includes a space before the period at the end of the sentences. This might be stylistically inconsistent with other Lao texts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the unnecessary space before the period at the end of the sentences.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Creation based on several files and folders' could be more naturally translated to convey the intended meaning. 'Baseada em' can sound a bit formal and indirect in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A criação a partir de vários ficheiros e pastas não está disponível para este tipo de sala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the Portuguese uses 'seção' for 'section.' While 'sala' is often used as a general term for 'room', it's slightly more precise to use 'seção de salas'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para criar esta sala, vá para a seção de salas ou use um dos formulários PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Creation based on several files and folders' is not perfectly conveyed. 'Crearea bazată pe mai multe fișiere sau foldere' is a literal translation but sounds slightly awkward in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Crearea unei săli pe baza mai multor fișiere sau foldere'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crearea unei săli pe baza mai multor fișiere sau foldere

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sală' is used twice. While technically correct, it's a bit repetitive. Considering 'camera' or 'spațiu' might improve readability, depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crearea unei săli pe baza mai multor fișiere sau foldere. Pentru crearea unei astfel de camere/spațiu, treceți la secțiunea Săli sau folosiți unul dintre formularele PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To create such a room' uses 'Pentru crearea unei astfel de sală'. The correct grammatical form would be 'Pentru crearea unei astfel de săli'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru crearea unei astfel de săli

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "based on several files and folders" is not accurately conveyed by "බොහෝ ගොනු සහ ෆෝල්ඩර් මත පදනම් වූ". A more accurate translation would emphasize the restriction – something like "several files and folders cannot be used to create this type of room".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම වර්ගයේ කාමරයක් සඳහා ගොනු සහ ෆෝල්ඩර් කිහිපයක් භාවිතා කිරීමට వీలు లేదు. (This type of room cannot use several files and folders.) or  මෙම වර්ගයේ කාමරයට ගොනු හා ෆෝල්ඩර් කිහිපයක් භාවිතා කිරීම අවසර නැත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure could be improved for readability. Sinhala sentence structure can be more flexible, but sometimes a more direct translation can feel less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම වර්ගයේ කාමරයකට ගොනු හා ෆෝල්ඩර් කිහිපයක් භාවිතා කරමින් නිර්මාණය කිරීම නොහැකිය. එවැනි කාමරයක් නිර්මාණය කිරීමට, කාමර කොටසට යන්න හෝ PDF ආකෘති වලින් එකක් භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Creation based on several files and folders" is somewhat awkwardly translated as "Kreiranje zasnovano na više fajlova i foldera." A more natural phrasing would be something like "Kreiranje sa više fajlova i foldera" or "Mogućnost kreiranja na osnovu više fajlova i foldera".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kreiranje sa više fajlova i foldera

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, "odljek Sobe" could be improved. It's missing a linking character. Assuming this is part of an application, 'Odeljak Sobe' should ideally point to the 'Rooms' section.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: odeljak Sobe

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Creation based on several files and folders" is somewhat awkwardly translated as "Việc tạo dựa trên một số tập tin và thư mục". A more natural translation would be "Việc tạo phòng dựa trên nhiều tập tin và thư mục" or "Khả năng tạo phòng dựa trên nhiều tập tin và thư mục".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Khả năng tạo phòng dựa trên nhiều tập tin và thư mục

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'form' is translated as 'biểu mẫu'. While correct, it can be more naturally phrased as 'mẫu' depending on context. In this case, 'mẫu PDF' is more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: mẫu PDF

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'based on several files and folders' is not perfectly captured. '基于多个文件和文件夹' literally translates to 'based on multiple files and folders,' which is technically correct but sounds slightly unnatural in Chinese. A more natural phrasing might be '使用多个文件和文件夹进行创建' (use multiple files and folders to create).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to: '使用多个文件和文件夹进行创建' or '包含多个文件和文件夹的创建'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, the tone is slightly formal. The '请' (qing - please) is a bit stiff for a warning message. It could be softened.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the '请' or replacing it with a less formal alternative depending on the overall tone of the application.
